IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 4 Months. IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 6 Months. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 2. Total custodial period is life.
